item.title: Buffett Watch: Berkshire Hathaway outperforms this week as tech stocks sink
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway's stock outperformed the benchmark S&P 500 stock index this week as investors sought safety from tech selling.

item.title: Fivespan brings amicable activism to Appian in a bid to lift the share price and build value
item.description: The activist firm prefers to take a "behind the scenes" approach when it works with a portfolio company.

item.title: Five stocks with more upside based on their latest earnings, according to Bank of America
item.description: Bank of America named five stocks this week that have plenty more room to run.

item.title: Time for traders to fade this group of stocks that's been on a tear, says Carter Worth
item.description: The low-beta, long-time laggard S&P 500 Consumer Staples Sector has come to in a big way the past 3 months, now up 15% in the period.
